roleset.name: force a thing into a destination
roleset.note: CROWBAR-V NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: crowbar-v: args 1, 3
example.text: [Further historical allusions]-1 are crowbarred *-1 into proceedings.

example.name: crowbar-v
example.text: It was directed solely to the law [by which]-1 Congress crowbarred the words "under God" into the Pledge *-1 back into the 1950s.

roleset.name: attack/ pry at with a crowbar, potentially with resulting state
roleset.note: CROWBAR-V NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: crowbar-v
example.text: A draft of winter air chilled me, and I turned to find that [my front window]-1 had been crowbarred *-1 open so violently that the latch was torn out of the frame.
example.arg: so violently that the latch was torn out of the frame
